p: Plasmid construction: The recombinant plasmids pcDNA3.1(+), which can stably express NA protein sequences of A/Vietnam/1203/2004 (H5N1), A/Anhui/1/2013 (H7N9) and A/Anhui/1/2013-R294K (H7N9-R294K) were transfected into CHO-K1 cells using Lipofectamine ® 2000 Reagent (Invitrogen™, Carlsbad, CA, USA).
